item.title: RTX
item.description: score:210 Chances: RTX has a golden opportunity to restart a 40-year-old missile business. Raytheon, with its recent contract with the U.S. Airforce, is set to expand its footprint in the missiles defense market. RTX’s Raytheon is set to expand its footprint in the global radar market, with the GhostEye MR contributing to the needs of the U.
